item.title: About me
item.description:
Hey! My name’s Rohit and I am a threat detection engineer by trade, currently employed at CRED, where I deal with blue teaming stuff day in and day out (more on this later). I completed my bachelor’s degree in Computer Science and Engineering from MNIT Jaipur.

I have been extremely interested in computing from a very young age. I enjoy breaking things down, and then trying to understand how they work from the ground up. Apart from tech stuff, I game, watch anime, and web shows, and hit the gym frequently ;)

item.title: About me
item.description:

You can download my public key from here. Most of my online identities have been cryptographically verified using Keyoxide and OpenPGP notations, check them here.
